# Service Level Objectives

## Service Overview
Brief description of the service.

## Key SLIs
- Availability
- Latency
- Error Rate
- Throughput

## SLO Targets
| Metric | Target |
|------|--------|
| Availability | 99.99% |
| Latency | ≤ X ms |
| Error Rate | ≤ X% |

## Error Budget Policy
How error budget is consumed and enforced.

## Monitoring
Dashboards and alerts.

## Review Cadence
How often SLOs are evaluated.
